Context:
The text provides information on how individuals can contribute to sustainability at George Brown College. Here are some factual information extracted from the text:

- George Brown College has a Sustainability Squad with an Instagram contact for more information.
- Turning off taps completely after use can save 25 liters of water per day and about 10,000 liters per year.
- There are environmental groups that individuals can join to take action on various sustainability issues.
- Individuals can learn more about the college's land acknowledgment by signing up for updates.
- The contact number for George Brown College is 416-415-2000 and TTY number is 1-877-515-5559.
- The email address to contact the college is ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
- The website's information is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
file_path: scraped_pages/otherpages/Sustainability. What can I do? | George Brown College.txt
